en.label: Calendar of the Uhr
en.description: The tri lunar calendar of the Uhr

months.name: Winterwane
months.description: Spring is starting to come in for real in most of the world, and winter is finally giving in

months.name: Everbloom
months.description: The storms and rainfalls are subsiding giving place to warmer weather. But sunny rains and cold nights are not unheard of

months.name: Sunfire
months.description: Sun is out and warm days are now in season

months.name: Goldenharvest
months.description: The harvest month were most crops around the world will be harvested and harvest feast will be abundant

months.name: Emberleaf
months.description: The trees and plants that shed their leaves each year are now in the most beautiful colo suit

months.name: Frostheart
months.description: The weather drops down, by now snow is abundant in most of the world

months.name: Closingtide
months.description: The last month of the year, and temperature will go down to the lowest points with ice cold days and even colder nights.

weekdays.name: First day
weekdays.description: First day right after the smallest moon and the middle moons have synced up in full moons, the smallest moon is new

weekdays.name: Second day
weekdays.description: The second day of the week where the middle moon is waning and the smallest moon is full

weekdays.name: Third day
weekdays.description: Middle of the week when both the middle moon and small moon are new

weekdays.name: Forth day
weekdays.description: The day when the smallest moon is full, and the middle moon is waxing

weekdays.name: Fifth day
weekdays.description: Second to last day of the week, the smallest moon is new and the middle moon is almost full

weekdays.name: Sixth day
weekdays.description: Last day of the week where both the small moon and the middle moon are both full

en.description: Ithun is the closest moon to Zothán and orbits with a period of 2 days. The moon is the smallest by both size and sight in the night sky. And is a red moon
Arthún is the middle moon orbiting Zothán with a period of 6 days. It is middle in both size and sight in the night sky. Shining bright white.

Mere is the outermost moon of Zothán and orbits with a period of 48 days. Mere, even though being the furthest out, is still the largest of the three moons by both size and sight in the sky. It is however dimmer than Arthún and appears more grey than white in the night sky.

seasons.name: Winter
seasons.description: The cold season where snow and ice rule most of the lands

seasons.name: Spring
seasons.description: Where snow and rain and storms give way to warmer weather

seasons.name: Summer
seasons.description: The warm period of the year with a lot of sun and warm weather days, at the end the harvest is brought in

seasons.name: Autumn
seasons.description: This is where the harvest is in, and the temperature starts to drop down and the storms and rains make themselves known again
